title: bugsplat
body: I have been searching for the problem in several weeks now but I cant find it, I´ve tried to fix it in my firewall but it says everythings alright, I´ve updated the drivers and repaird League of legends and done allmost all kind of stuff right now and im stuck. Do you have any idea of what it can be?

replies.body:
Bugsplats are actually most often caused by system driver or hardware issues. Not to worry, though, this is frequently resolved after working through our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), since we've consolidated the most common fixes in that guide.

Let me know if this helped.
